mapper.select: select res.* from warrior_resources res left join (select own_id,res_id from warrior_permissions where type=0) wp on res.res_id = wp.res_id left join warrior_user_role wr on wp.own_id = wr.role_id where wr.user_id = #{userId} and res.is_show = 0 and res.status = 0 ORDER BY res.sort asc

select res.* from warrior_resources res left join (select own_id,res_id from warrior_permissions where type=1) wp on res.res_id = wp.res_id where wp.own_id = #{userId} and res.is_show = 0 and res.status = 0 ORDER BY res.sort asc
select wp.res_id from warrior_permissions wp where wp.type = #{type} and wp.own_id = #{ownId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM warrior.warrior_permissions WHERE own_id = #{ownId} AND type = #{type}
